document_title: Genital herpes: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
1. Medicine
Antiviral medications help speed up ulcer healing time and reduce pain. The medicine is used at the first signs of an outbreak (itching and other symptoms).; If the first flare-up has already occurred, your Dermatologist will prescribe medication to reduce the likelihood of future flare-ups.
2. Home care
People with genital herpes should bathe in warm water and use mild detergents, keep the area with herpes clean and dry, and wear loose cotton clothes to help the body feel more comfortable.
